tool_description: Creates engaging social media captions with appropriate tone, call-to-actions, and platform-specific formatting.

content_theme.description: The main theme or topic for the caption

brand_voice.description: Brand personality: professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, or educational

caption_length.description: Desired length: short, medium, or long

call_to_action.description: Specific action to encourage: like, comment, share, click_link, visit_profile, or none

include_emojis.description: Whether to include relevant emojis in the caption

target_platform.description: Primary platform: instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, or tiktok

error_messages: Invalid brand voice: Use one of [professional, casual, humorous, inspirational, educational]
Invalid caption length: Use short, medium, or long
Invalid call to action: Use one of [like, comment, share, click_link, visit_profile, none]
Invalid target platform: Use one of [instagram, facebook, twitter, linkedin, tiktok]
Empty content theme: Provide a clear theme or topic for caption creation
usage: Provide content theme, brand voice, and desired caption length. Optionally specify call-to-action, emoji preferences, and target platform. Returns engaging captions optimized for the specified requirements.

primary_caption.description: Main caption text optimized for the specified parameters

alternative_captions.description: Additional caption variations for A/B testing

word_count.description: Number of words in the primary caption
